Event Manager Antri:
The Queen Ant lives in the Ant Nest. If you want to kill her, you should go there.
However, the Ant Nest is a very dangerous place. If I send there everybody, many will die in vain. So only those who meet certain requirements can go.
First of all, you have to be Lv. 65 or higher to go to the Ant Nest. Secondly, you must find yourself a command channel with 50-200 members.
If you manage to defeat the Queen Ant, you will be rewarded.
